verbs.description: [V: suspected] russian agent abruptly moved from dc to va jail after complaints of condition maria butina who is facing charges of working as a russian agent in the u s was spirited from a d c detention facility to an alexandria virginia jail after grumbling from the russian government about her treatment in custody maria zakharova butina russian embassy ms maria butina government of russia united states marshals service robert driscoll post newsweek stations russia ministry of foreign affairs russia
